description: Restores 500 HP to one ally. Take one to get rid of body pain, and get back in the game.
name: Acetaminophen

description: Restores 200 MP to one ally. Drink responsibly.
name: Liquid Courage

description: Removes basic status ailments (Poison, Blind, Silence) from one ally. Smells like pine trees.
name: Dried Green Herb

description: Revives a fallen ally with half HP. A shot in the arm.
name: Stimulant

description: Restores 200 HP to one ally. A yummy sandwich.
name: Sandwich

description: Restores 50 HP to one ally. Tasty sausages.
name: Hot Links

description: Removes most negative statuses and restores 25% HP. Smells like cheese.
name: Fresh Green Herb

description: A Big Burrito from Filiberto's that fully restores HP and MP for one ally.
name: Spicy Burrito

description: A highly caffeinated beverage that restores 50 TP to one ally.
name: Energy Drink

description: A piece of a broken necklace. Quest item.
name: Necklace piece

description: A beautifully restored necklace. Quest item.
name: Fancy Necklace

description: A key found in a smelly location. Quest item.
name: Smelly key #1

description:
"Got Rabies? Take Rabinex."
Cures Rabies. By Acme.
name: Rabinex

description:
"Get clean with Hep-A-Leave."
Cures Hepatitis B. By Acme.
name: Hep-A-Leave

description:
"Gonorrhea be gone."
Cures Gonorrhea. By Acme
name: Gon-A-Gone

description:
"Get the Clap from your ex? Clapinex."
Cures The Clap. By Acme.
name: Clapinex

description: Cures Syphilis. By Acme.
name: Syphinex

description: Cures constipation. By Acme.
name: Colon Blow

description:
"Put a cork in it."
Cures Diarrhea. By Acme.
name: Corkinex

description:
"Wrap the Whopper."
Resists STDs for 5 turns. By Acme.
name: Protection

description: Blow up a foe.
name: Grenade

description: This grenade has a chance to poison an enemy.
name: Poison Grenade

description: This grenade has a chance to blind all enemies.
name: Smoke Grenade

description: This grenade has a chance to blind an enemy.
name: Flash Grenade

description: Temporarily boosts ATK for one ally. Performance Enhancer by Acme.
name: Buff-er-in

description:
"Got Herpes? Take Herpicin."
Cures Herpes. By Acme.
name: Herpicin

description: An engine needed to repair a crane. Quest Item.
name: Engine

description: A key found in a smelly location. Quest Item.
name: Smelly Key #2

name: Smelly Key #3

name: Smelly Key #5

name: Smelly Key #6

description: A key found in a smelly location. Quest Item.
name: Smelly Key #7

description: A coin used to buy things from Vend-O-Matic machines.
name: Vend-O-Matic Token

description: Restores 1500 HP to one ally. Stronger pain relief.
name: Ibuprofen

description: Fully restores HP for one ally. Maximum strength pain relief.
name: Oxycontin

description: Restores 500 MP to one ally. Premium blend.
name: Top Shelf Liquor

description: Fully restores MP for one ally. Vintage reserve.
name: Aged Scotch

description: Revives a fallen ally with full HP. Miraculous intervention.
name: Adrenaline Shot

description: Cures all negative status effects (except KO, Doom, severe diseases) for one ally.
name: Panacea

description: Fully restores HP and MP for one ally. A miracle cure.
name: Elixir

description: Fully restores TP for one ally. Liquid motivation.
name: Max Energy Drink

description: Cures Paralysis for one ally.
name: Nerve Tonic

description: Cures Petrify for one ally.
name: Softener

description: Cures Curse for one ally.
name: Holy Water

description: Temporarily increases DEF for one ally.
name: Iron Skin Draught

description: Temporarily increases MAT for one ally.
name: Mind Elixir

description: Temporarily increases MDF for one ally.
name: Barrier Tonic

description: Temporarily increases AGI for one ally.
name: Swiftness Potion

description: Temporarily increases LUK for one ally.
name: Lucky Clover Brew

description: An unstable explosive device. Niles wants this. Quest item.
name: Unstable Explosive

description: A fragment of digital data found in the Matrix from Sector 6. It contains information about Project Nexus.
name: Data Fragment - Sector 6

description: A fragment of digital data found in the Matrix from Sector 7. It contains information about Project Nexus.
name: Data Fragment - Sector 7

description: A fragment of digital data found in the Matrix from Sector 8. It contains information about Project Nexus.
name: Data Fragment - Sector 8

description: A fragment of digital data found in the Matrix from Sector 9. It contains information about Project Nexus.
name: Data Fragment - Sector 9

description: A fragment of digital data found in the Matrix from Sector 10. It contains information about Project Nexus.
name: Data Fragment - Sector 10

description: A neural data fragment needed for Dr. Nakamura's research. Quest item.
name: Neural Data Fragment A

description: A neural data fragment needed for Dr. Nakamura's research. Quest item.
name: Neural Data Fragment B

description: A neural data fragment needed for Dr. Nakamura's research. Quest item.
name: Neural Data Fragment C

description: An experimental neural enhancement that increases all stats permanently. Created by Dr. Nakamura at B.M.N.E.C.
name: Prototype Neural Enhancement

description: Restores 3000 HP to one ally. Advanced medical technology.
name: Nano-Med Injection

description: Restores 1000 MP to one ally. Synthetic neural stimulant.
name: Neuro-Stim Serum

description: Restores 1500 HP to all allies. Advanced medical spray.
name: Medi-Mist Spray

description: Temporarily increases all stats for one ally for 5 turns.
name: Combat Stim Pack

description: Deals ice damage to all enemies. Freezing technology from the abandoned space station.
name: Cryo Grenade

description: Deals fire damage to all enemies. Incendiary technology from the abandoned space station.
name: Plasma Grenade

description: A strange artifact found in the abandoned space station. It seems to contain alien technology. Quest item.
name: Alien Artifact

description: Revives all fallen allies with full HP. Miraculous alien technology.
name: Resurrection Matrix

description: A rare neural stabilizer component needed for Rex's implant enhancement. Found in the B.M.N.E.C.
name: Neural Stabilizer Component

description: A quantum processor needed for Rex's implant enhancement. Found in the B.M.N.E.C.
name: Quantum Processor

description: A bio-adaptive interface needed for Rex's implant enhancement. Found in the B.M.N.E.C.
name: Bio-Adaptive Interface

description: An enhanced neural implant created by Zed. Stabilizes Rex's connection to the digital realm and unlocks new abilities.
name: Enhanced Neural Implant

description: A specialized hacking device needed for Dick's heist at Quantum Dynamics.
name: Quantum Encryption Bypass

description: A stealth field generator needed for Dick's heist at Quantum Dynamics.
name: Stealth Field Generator

description: Stolen corporate data revealing connections between the MegaCorps and the A.S.P. project.
name: Corporate Conspiracy Data

description: A navigation chart for the dangerous asteroid field Jack needs to traverse.
name: Asteroid Field Navigation Chart

description: A shield modulator to protect Jack's ship from asteroid impacts.
name: Shield Modulator

description: Information about A.S.P.'s expanding influence provided by refugees.
name: A.S.P. Intelligence Report

description: A surveillance drone used to scout the Floating Mansion.
name: Surveillance Drone

description: Security codes for the Floating Mansion's outer perimeter.
name: Security Access Codes

description: A detailed map of the Floating Mansion's layout.
name: Floating Mansion Schematics

description: Corporate data needed for Zed's A.S.P. research.
name: Corporate Research Data

description: A prototype device created by Zed that can temporarily disrupt A.S.P.'s control systems.
name: A.S.P. Disruptor

description: A security keycard that grants access to the restricted 4th floor of the B.M.N.E.C. facility.
name: B.M.N.E.C. Security Keycard

description: A shutdown code created by Dr. Eliza Voss that can permanently deactivate A.S.P. when uploaded to all five MegaCorp mainframes simultaneously.
name: A.S.P. Shutdown Code
